name: The Sims 2: Celebration! Stuff
storyline: Sims 2 Celebration Stuff is an all-new collection of items for throwing the great parties that every Sim wants! Make every party unique with this selection of furniture and party fashions. There's also a wider selection of outfits for weddings and elegant evening parties. Best of all, you can throw a fiesta-themed party!
summary: Your Sims can now celebrate in style with this fun collection of furniture, party fashions, and décor items in The Sims 2: Celebration Stuff. Throw the ultimate celebrations with all-new items including delicious cakes, colorful paper lanterns, balloons, sparkling tiaras, and more. Host the social events of the season with your Sims! The pack includes two pre-made houses and 54 new items.
